item.description:
Awesome atmosphere! Very pretty stuff! That bass line fits a lot better than expected. Very underrated you are. Piano is beautiful! Drums need a bit more percussion behind them. Maybe that‚Äôs just me though. I friggen love this piano man! Sweeper is just a tad too loud, but you got it man!
